name: Weatherworn
description:
Weatherworn is an all-ages adventure following the young Pup and their astronaut grandfather Pap. The stranded pair investigate a dangerous world. A retro RPG with a modern pace about the seasons of life and loss.

KEY FEATURES
-A unique story-driven experience following Pap & Pup.
-Fun mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics.
-Hand drawn cutscenes inspired from comic book art.
-The joy of a long RPG in a bitesize format.
-Great music and voice cast.
-Plenty of secrets!

Prequel Comic: https://weatherworn.itch.io/weatherworn-game-prequel-comic
